Type Description
Text

CalculateStringNearness

Computes a nearness score between strings. Nearness is based on repeatedly finding longest common substrings. Substring matches below Threshold are not considered. Normalizing factor is the max value returned by this procedure.

procedure CalculateStringNearness(FirstString: Text, SecondString: Text, Threshold: Integer, NormalizingFactor: Integer): Integer

Parameters

Name Type Description
FirstString Text

First string to match
SecondString Text

Second string to match
Threshold Integer

Substring matches below Threshold are not considered
NormalizingFactor Integer

Max value returned by this procedure

Returns

Type Description
Integer

A number between 0 and NormalizingFactor, representing how much of the strings was matched

CalculateExactStringNearness

Like CalculateStringNearness, however it doesn't repeatedly takes substrings, only once. The result is normalized with respect to the length of the BaseString, in contrast with CalculateStringNearness where it was normalized with respect ot the shorter one.

procedure CalculateExactStringNearness(ComparingString: Text, BaseString: Text, NormalizingFactor: Integer): Integer

Parameters

Name Type Description
ComparingString Text
BaseString Text
NormalizingFactor Integer

Max value returned by this procedure

Returns

Type Description
Integer

A number between 0 and NormalizingFactor representing how much of BaseString was found in ComparingString

SetRespectThresholdForNumbers

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 22.0. Numeric matches are not considered below the Lower limit threshold. This procedure is unused

[Obsolete(Numeric matches are not considered below the Lower limit threshold. This procedure is unused,22.0)]
procedure SetRespectThresholdForNumbers(NewValue: Boolean)

NewValue Boolean
